full_story: One sunny morning, Fred and Wilma Flintstone, along with their friends Barney and Betty Rubble, packed their bags for an exciting trip to the west! “We’re going to take care of my cousins’ ranch!” Fred shouted, his voice booming with excitement. Pebbles bounced around, her pigtails flying, “I can’t wait to see the horses!” Dino wagged his tail, barking happily as they loaded into the car. When they arrived, Tumbleweed and Mary Lou Jim greeted them, but soon Fred and Barney wandered off to explore. Suddenly, they spotted a group of actors dressed like cowboys, and Fred yelled, "Look at those real cowpokes!" They ran away, thinking they were in a wild adventure! But oh no! They bumped into another group of actors dressed as "Indians!" Fred shouted, “Help! We’re in trouble!” Just then, Wilma and Betty, who had been enjoying a picnic, heard the commotion. “We can’t let them get hurt!” said Wilma, determination in her eyes. They rushed to save their husbands, waving picnic baskets like shields. “Back away, you silly actors!” Betty shouted, and the actors, surprised, stumbled back! When Tumbleweed and Mary Lou returned, they couldn’t believe the story! “Actors? Indians?” Tumbleweed laughed, but just then, the actors came back for more fun, and Tumbleweed squeaked, “Oh no! It’s really happening!” Everyone burst into laughter, and Fred said, “Maybe we’re the real cowpokes after all!” With giggles and smiles, they all realized that adventure is better when shared with friends and family!

global_characters_dict.Dino: Dino is a medium-sized, cartoon dinosaur with a long neck and a friendly look. He has a round, plump body with a long, flexible tail and short limbs. His head is large and elongated with a wide mouth and rounded snout. Dino’s neck is very long and slender. His skin is smooth and bright pink with several dark spots on his back. He has small, round eyes set close together, expressive eyebrows, and two small nostrils near the end of his snout. He also has a pair of small, rounded ears on top of his head and a few thin, black hair strands. His toes and fingers are rounded, and his overall posture is upright and cheerful. Dino is a pink dinosaur with black spots on his back and tail. He wears a light blue collar with a yellow tag. His overall look is playful and cartoonish, matching a pet-like character in a prehistoric setting.
global_characters_dict.Betty: Betty is a young woman with a petite frame and soft facial features. She has a slender body with a small waist and long legs. She has a small, oval face with a rounded chin. Her skin is fair and smooth. Betty’s hair is jet black, short, and styled in a neat bob with a slight wave, topped with a small bow. Her eyebrows are thin and arched, and her eyelashes are short. She has large, expressive eyes and a small nose. Her lips are full and usually smiling. Her ears are small and set close to her head. Her fingers are slender, and her overall appearance is gentle and approachable. Betty is wearing a light blue, sleeveless dress with a jagged hem, made from a simple, stone-age style fabric. She has a black necklace with a white pendant and a blue bow in her hair. She is barefoot, and her style is casual and primitive.
global_characters_dict.Barney: Barney is a short, stout man with a compact, rounded body. He has no beard or mustache. He has a proportionally large head on a short, thick neck and broad shoulders. His limbs are short and thick, particularly his legs, giving him a sturdy appearance. His posture is relaxed with slightly sloped shoulders. He has fair, smooth skin. Barney’s face is rounded with a prominent, bulbous nose and a small chin. He has small, round eyes and thick, short eyebrows. His blonde hair is neatly cut and styled flat against his head. His ears are small and close to the head. He has a wide smile, showcasing evenly spaced teeth. Barney is wearing a sleeveless, brown tunic that is short and rough-edged, tied at the neck with a simple string. The fabric looks coarse and primitive. He is barefoot, and his outfit has a casual, stone-age style.
global_characters_dict.Fred: Fred is a middle-aged man with a large and broad body. He has no beard or mustache. He has a strong, stocky body with broad shoulders and short, thick legs. His head is large in proportion to his body, with a wide jaw and a pronounced chin. He has a round face and a short neck. His skin is light and smooth. His hair is black, thick, and styled with a simple side part. His eyebrows are bold and slightly arched. He has a wide mouth with visible front teeth and a big smile. His ears are medium-sized and stick out slightly. His nose is large and rounded, and his eyes are oval-shaped with small pupils. Fred is wearing a sleeveless, knee-length orange tunic with black spots, made of a rough, stone-age style fabric. He has a blue necktie and is barefoot. His overall style is casual and primitive, matching a prehistoric theme.
global_characters_dict.Wilma: Wilma is a slender woman with a graceful and elegant appearance. She has a slender body with long arms and legs, and her proportions are tall and elegant. Her shoulders are narrow, and her neck is long and thin. She has a small, oval-shaped face and a pointed chin. Her skin is fair and smooth. Her hair is bright orange, thick, and styled in a high bun with a distinct curl at the front. Her eyebrows are thin and curved, and her eyelashes are short. She has small, round eyes and a small nose. Her lips are red and well-defined. Her ears are small and close to her head. Her fingers are long and slim, and she is always in a graceful, upright posture. Wilma is wearing a one-shoulder, white dress with a jagged hem, made from a simple, stone-age style fabric. She has a chunky white necklace and is barefoot. Her overall look is minimalist and primitive, fitting a prehistoric theme.
global_characters_dict.Pebbles: Pebbles is a small toddler girl with a round face and a playful expression. She has a chubby, short body with a large head compared to her body, short arms and legs, and a visible baby belly. Her posture is relaxed and playful. Pebbles has fair, smooth skin. Her hair is bright orange, thick, and tied up in a high ponytail with a large white bow. She has fine, short eyebrows and long eyelashes. Her eyes are big and round, and her cheeks are full. She has a small, upturned nose and a wide smile, showing her small teeth. Her ears are small and close to her head.  Pebbles is wearing a sleeveless, bright green top with black spots and blue shorts. She has her orange hair tied up with a large white bone-shaped hair accessory. Her style is cute and playful, fitting for a young child in a stone-age setting. She is barefoot.

Pebbles is a small toddler girl with a round face and a playful expression. She has a chubby, short body with a large head compared to her body, short arms and legs, and a visible baby belly. Her posture is relaxed and playful. Pebbles has fair, smooth skin. Her hair is bright orange, thick, and tied up in a high ponytail with a large white bow. She has fine, short eyebrows and long eyelashes. Her eyes are big and round, and her cheeks are full. She has a small, upturned nose and a wide smile, showing her small teeth. Her ears are small and close to her head.  Pebbles is wearing a sleeveless, bright green top with black spots and blue shorts. She has her orange hair tied up with a large white bone-shaped hair accessory. Her style is cute and playful, fitting for a young child in a stone-age setting. She is barefoot.A lively stage scene where the characters are preparing for a fun performance with a sense of excitement and anticipation in the air as Tumbleweed expresses concern. The main objects in the scene include a colorful stage backdrop props for the performance and a microphone that Tumbleweed is using to speak. Dino is in the foreground slightly to the left taking center stage. Betty is next to Dino also in the foreground slightly to the right. Barney is in the center of the stage commanding attention. Fred is positioned behind Barney in the middle ground. Wilma is off to the side in the background observing the scene. Pebbles is in the foreground close to her parents bouncing with excitement.    } The background features a colorful stage with bright curtains whimsical props and a cheering audience creating a lively and festive atmosphere. Wide shot capturing the entire stage and all the characters in action highlighting the energy and excitement of the performance.

captions_info.caption: Everyone burst into laughter, and Fred exclaimed, “Maybe we’re the real cowpokes after all!”
captions_info.description: Fred. Fred is a middle-aged man with a large and broad body. He has no beard or mustache. He has a strong, stocky body with broad shoulders and short, thick legs. His head is large in proportion to his body, with a wide jaw and a pronounced chin. He has a round face and a short neck. His skin is light and smooth. His hair is black, thick, and styled with a simple side part. His eyebrows are bold and slightly arched. He has a wide mouth with visible front teeth and a big smile. His ears are medium-sized and stick out slightly. His nose is large and rounded, and his eyes are oval-shaped with small pupils. Fred is wearing a sleeveless, knee-length orange tunic with black spots, made of a rough, stone-age style fabric. He has a blue necktie and is barefoot. His overall style is casual and primitive, matching a prehistoric theme.A cheerful scene where Fred and his friends are sharing a light-hearted moment filled with laughter and camaraderie as they embrace their playful cowboy personas. A rustic wooden table with a few cowboy hats and playful props scattered around emphasizing the fun theme of cowpokes. There may also be some playful decorations like toy horses or lassos in the background. Fred is animatedly speaking his arms raised slightly as he gestures while he laughs clearly enjoying the moment with his friends. Freds face is bright with joy and amusement showcasing a wide grin and sparkling eyes filled with excitement as he makes his playful remark. Fred is positioned in the center of the foreground slightly leaning forward with enthusiasm surrounded by his friends who are also laughing and engaged in the moment. The scene is set in a cozy rustic environment possibly resembling a barn or a country-themed gathering space decorated with hay bales and cowboy-themed items enhancing the playful atmosphere. Medium shot capturing Fred and his friends in a lively interaction allowing the viewer to see their expressions and the fun props around them.
